title: The Ghost Inside - Fury And The Fallen Ones
description:
Los Angeles, CA&#039;s The Ghost Inside has set an April 15th release date for their debut album Fury and the Fallen Ones through Mediaskare Records. Recorded in Oakland, CA with producer Zack Ohren (As Blood Runs Black, First Blood), Fury and the Fallen Ones features 12tracks of hardcore inspired metal that is fast and in your face; three of those tracks "Faith Or Forgiveness," "Destined" and "Provoke" can be heard on the band&#039;s MySpace page located here:

Album: Fury And The Fallen Ones
Release: April 2008
